page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: Kids Today Kids today do not talk about specific things.It is all a mixture of things. Sometimes we talk about fashion, the latest crazes, new records, pop groups, what you're doing tonight, what was on television or jokes. When we have conversations they can turn into rows because of differences of opinion.Sometimes we talk about school,what teachers we like and hate, what lessons we like and hate. When we are at school we sometimes discuss what lessons we have next. We sometimes talk about things we do not want to write down. Tracy Heather Aged 13.
